scripts.build: npm run build -w client && npm run build -w server
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w client && npm run lint -w server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w client && npm run lint:fix -w server
scripts.format: npm run format -w client && npm run format -w server
scripts.db:migrate: npm exec -w server prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: npm exec -w server prisma db seed
